title: The Good Earth
creator_credit: Sidney A. Franklin, Irving G. Thalberg and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Set in pre-revolutionary China, Paul Muni plays Wang Lung, a simple peasant farmer who rises to become a prosperous lord. Tragedy pursues him as he betrays his family and neglects the earth he has worshipped. Luise Rainer won an Academy Award for her portrayal of O-Lan, Wang’s devoted wife, a battered slave who grows into a proud, loyal woman. Based on Pearl S. Buck’s Pulitzer Prize winning novel.

constellations_other.name: Legacy of an icon: Anna May Wong
constellations_other.description: Wong Liu Tsong, known professionally as Anna May Wong, was a film star in the 1920s and 30s who made a career for herself despite racist stereotypes and vilification. Her legacy lives on as she is now being portrayed by contemporary actors on film and TV.
